title: 朋友新手砌機 想問list有冇問題

replies.msg:
CPU:Intel Core i7-7700K KabyLake (LGA1151, 8M Cache, up to 4.50 GHz)

Motherboard:MSI H110M PRO-VD Plus H110,DDR4,LGA 1151,USB3.1,SATA3 6Gb/s,M.ATX M/B

GPU:msi gaming x 1060 6gb

SSD:Intel SSD 600P M.2 2280 256GB SSDPEKKW256G7X1 PCIe NVMe 3.0 x4 SSD

HDD:WD Blue WD10EZEX 1TB SATA3 6Gb/s /64MB HDD

RAM:GEIL Evo FORZA RED DDR4 8GB 2400MHZ GFR48GB2400C16SC 散熱片x2

【CPU風冷】Cooler Master Hyper 212 LED CPU Cooler RR-212L-16PR-R1

CASE:SAMA Milestone ATX Gaming Case (前置USB3.0+讀咭器/背板走線/超大側透設計)


求指點

7700k+h110+2400ram+600p ssd
你都係叫佢去搵悠二list參考下先啦(唔一定要跟)

7700k
H110m

如果板用咩好？

仇人list

當係打個和
i5 7500 / 1060 6g / gaming3 MB / 16 GB ram算啦

7700k
H110m

如果板用咩好？

起碼都搵塊有m.2既板先 你朋友用緊m.2 ssd呀
叫佢睇下悠二list先啦
佢話轉用呢個板 **MSI Z270A-PRO Z270/LGA1151/DDR4/USB3.1 ATX

CPU:Intel Core i7-7700K KabyLake (LGA1151, 8M Cache, up to 4.50 GHz)

Motherboard:MSI H110M PRO-VD Plus H110,DDR4,LGA 1151,USB3.1,SATA3 6Gb/s,M.ATX M/B

GPU:msi gaming x 1060 6gb

SSD:Intel SSD 600P M.2 2280 256GB SSDPEKKW256G7X1 PCIe NVMe 3.0 x4 SSD

HDD:WD Blue WD10EZEX 1TB SATA3 6Gb/s /64MB HDD

RAM:GEIL Evo FORZA RED DDR4 8GB 2400MHZ GFR48GB2400C16SC 散熱片x2

CASE:SAMA Milestone ATX Gaming Case (前置USB3.0+讀咭器/背板走線/超大側透設計)


求指點


7700K 唔超? 1060, 而家炒價好貴

如果OC, 212 唔夠力散熱,,, 同埋個list 無PSU

唔記得左

Cooler Master Elite V3 550w ATX Power Supply

開唔開到機

指點下

http://yujihw.com
根據budget入去睇下啲砌機組合/組合入面嘅硬件啦
